pages.text: $(li)Stone Shores are a simple small biome which often appear when a Mountainous biome is generated near an Ocean.$(br)$(li)They are composed mostly of Stone, Limestone, Scoria, Marble, Diorite and Andesite.$(br)$(li)This biome can be found in the Overworld.
$(li)You can search this biome by typing the word $(l)Stone Shores$() in the search box of the $(l:patchouli:perks/natures_compass)Nature's Compass$(/l).
